#summary Features planned for the next release

= Partial to-do list for version 0.3.0 =

These features are already available in SVN in the 0.3-dev branch. All or some of them may also be available as a preview release in the downloads section.

  * Add a genre/album/song tree view of the music collection.
  * Add a genre/album/song list view of the music collection.
